title: Instructional Design Course for Strengthening Community Organization Assessment Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic assessment concepts and foundational organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Based Learning Environments Emphasizing Practical Application Through Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can develop evaluation plans by applying organizational change models
Learners can design stakeholder motivation strategies to improve assessment participation rates by 30% or more
Learners can create mobile-friendly assessment tools (infographics/surveys) tailored to community characteristics in smartphone environments
Learners can complete assessment reports using collaboration tools on LMS platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
